note:
Books. Lots of books.

Dreamer, shaper, writer, maker. Queer and neuroqueer.

I've never met a language I didn't love, and I have too many projects/interests/hobbies. When I learned that the word 'poetry' is rooted in a word that means 'to make', it felt deeply right because it linked together different parts of my being.

I don't care what pronouns you use for me, but if you want some guidance, use he or they.

Born at 338 ppm.
